channel.title: Compiler help
channel.description:
hey can you plz help me i have tried everything b4 i posted this and i still could not get it working it says the system cannot find the path specified press any key to continue.
This is what is in file plz help @echo off title Compiling.. "C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp src;c3p0-0.9.1.1.jar;sqljdbc.jar;mysql-connector-java-5.0.5-bin.jar ./src/net/Bandos/server/*.java "C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp src;c3p0-0.9.1.1.jar;sqljdbc.jar;mysql-connector-java-5.0.5-bin.jar ./src/net/Bandos/RSInstances/*.java pause

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @tasumaru tasumaru
item.description:
@tasumaru wrote:

@echo off
title Compiling…
“C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe” -cp src;c3p0-0.9.1.1.jar;sqljdbc.jar;mysql-connector-java-5.0.5-bin.jar ./src/net/Bandos/server/.java
“C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe” -cp src;c3p0-0.9.1.1.jar;sqljdbc.jar;mysql-connector-java-5.0.5-bin.jar ./src/net/Bandos/RSInstances/.java
pause
to this?

i just done a java test and it is that but it still wont work just keeps saying path not specified…?

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Change the JDK path to the JDK version you use.

Read full topic
